file_content.text: Transmit everything you know about the Forge to my droid T7.
That area is considered highly dangerous. May I inquire why you need this data?
Flesh Raiders captured Master Orgus and took him there.
By the stars! What perfectly awful timing.
The temple Masters are all indisposed fighting Flesh Raiders. I will alert them immediately, but they may be unable to assist you.
Do be careful. The temple has received several alerts regarding Flesh Raider activities in the area.
You want a memory wipe? Just do it!
Well, really! I'll report your behavior to the Council when they return.
T7 = receiving files on Forge // T7 = show Jedi the way
T7 + Jedi = go to Forge + save Master Orgus!
I am A-4P0, Jedi archivist. How may I help you?
